# Attuned Alarm (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F (a tiny bell and a piece of very fine silver wire)/DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space

**Duration:** 2 hours/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Treasures of Freeport (Green Ronin), pg. 20

As *[[Alarm (Spell)|alarm]]* except that the spell can only broadcast a mental *alarm* not an audible one. The *alarm* may be attuned to yourself and/or a number of individuals other than yourself who are present at the time of the casting, up to a limit of one person per caster level. When the *alarm* sounds all of the attuned individuals perceive the *alarm* assuming they are within the 1-mile limit.

**GM Note**

*House Rule: Attuned alarm* can be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.
